overview:
Bob builds and grows early-stage technology companies. He is currently building stuff (products, teams, processes, value) at SumAll.

Bob started his career at EDS where he spent 9 years programming, implementing advanced technologies and managing customers.

He left EDS in 1999 to co-found Aptegrity, the industry’s first Managed Services Provider (MSP). Aptegrity was acquired by Globix in 2003, where he was later promoted to COO.

In 2006 Bob left Globix to join Vidavee, an Internet video publishing platform, where he commercialized the tech, built the delivery organization and managed all client operations. Vidavee was acquired by Vignette in 2008.

Bob took a run at the exciting Q&A space when he cofounded Honestly Now, a consumer facing Q&A site for personal questions and professional advice.

He now spends his time at SumAll, immersed in business analytics, trying to help online merchants better understand their business data.
